name: Gearbits Test site
description:
Gearbits test site is a third person action game where you pilot a giant robot.

Choose a robot, pick your weapons and test them out at the test site. Defeat monsters and beat enemy pilots to unlock more gear.

Don't forget to leave a report after your test flight! Any feedback and suggestions are appreciated. (But if you submit a bug report that is just a screenshot of the bug enemies I'll add you to the wall of shame for unfunny dummies)

This is a small demo that I'm hoping to eventually expand into a full game. I've been working on this for a while now and I'm finally ready to publish a playable demo. It's far from finished of course. But if I just keep fussing with it and try to make it perfect it's never going to get done.
